pullRequest.body:
We define light profinite sets as structures containing the data of a sequential limit in `Profinite`.

---

nodes.body: Thanks for the review, and in particular for pointing out the missing explicit universes!

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7035960761/job/19147533634)

This definition should be moved to a suitable namespace:
```suggestion
def LightProfinite'.toLightFunctor : LightProfinite' ⥤ LightProfinite where
```
You should add some explicit universe parameters here and there because this definition seem to apply only to the `0` universe.
